column4: I am having problems with google chrome on Ubuntu 11.10. Chrome keeps crashing unexpectedly. I have googled for this problem but the only answers I find are for windows. I have already tried uninstalling, deleting the hidden chrome folder in my home directory and reinstalling but I still have the problem
are you using the proprietary Google Chrome? Or Chromium, from the Ubuntu repositories?
also, you'll likely have better support with the libre Chromium from Ubuntu's repositories than the proprietary Google Chrome from Google's repos
